headline: Ask HN: Is anyone using the new GitHub v2 projects?
description:
I'm really frustrated with how they developed this thing. I use Zenhub which seamlessly integrates Issues with GitHub.

For those who don't know, Zenhub manages GitHub issues(all of them) in Kanban board. This is not how GitHub projects is implemented, as every issue needs to be converted to a card and added to a specific Project.

The second problem is filtering or searching. You need to create a new view to really filter or search your "board". In a sense they duplicated issues but removed search from them and reimplemented entire UI so they look like issues.

My use case is "I want view to manage Sprint using issues", it's not possible to do that with GitHub Projects v2. Is anyone actually using to manage Sprints in GitHub, I would like to hear your experience with it?

I came across this https://i0.wp.com/user-images.githubusercontent.com/98360703/181262320-ccf26012-2efb-4f4d-9a7a-51af0ea18584.png on https://github.blog/changelog/2022-07-27-github-issues-projects-now-generally-available/ and I don't beleive it. Do they like to torture people :D?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有人在使用新的GitHub v2项目吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有人在使用新的GitHub v2項目嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
我对他们开发这个东西的方式感到非常沮丧。我使用Zenhub，它将问题与GitHub无缝集成。

对于那些不知道的人来说，Zenhub在看板中管理GitHub问题（所有问题）。这不是GitHub项目的实现方式，因为每个问题都需要转换为卡片，并添加到一个特定的项目。你需要创建一个新的视图来真正过滤或搜索你的"板"。

我的用例是"我想用问题来管理Sprint"，GitHub Projects v2不可能做到这一点。有没有人真正使用GitHub来管理Sprints，我想听听你的经验？

我在https://github.blog/changelog/2022-07-27-github-issues-projects-now-generally-available/ 上看到这个https://i0.wp.com/user-images.githubusercontent.com/98360703/181262320-ccf26012-2efb-4f4d-9a7a-51af0ea18584.png，我不相信。他们喜欢折磨人吗：D？
